* * A ";" is not interpreted as having any special meaning.

* * The "event-signature" may be one of the 4 * formats:

text: // three general cases we check here as to whether to render a physical SQL join: // 1) is our parent a DotNode as well? The piece it generally // tends to miss is that INNER joins effect the results by further // restricting the data set!  A particular manifestation of this is // the fact that the classic translator will skip the physical join // for ToOne implicit joins *if the query is shallow*; the result // being that Query.list() and Query.iterate() could return // different number of results!
